name: Escapologist Murder Case Hidden Objects
description:
Escapologist Murder Case Hidden Objects

one murderer have done a murder and now he is trying to escape from that situation,cops could not not able to find any of clue regarding to that murder would you like to help them to find the clue then download this game and find the hidden items regarding to the murder case.find the hidden item and make a score,this game is a one type of puzzle game user should have to find the items and solve the case,by playing this game user can improve their observation skill as well as their brain power.find the hidden objects and make a score,share your score with your friends and colleagues.this game is made for all the types of peoples who like a curiosity.so download this game and improve your brain power.

Key Features of this game

-> Lot's of levels

-> each level make user more curious to play a next level

-> Functionality of hints

-> different type of bunches

and many more things download this game now,
